item.title: DSCF4447
item.description: This was another shot I took during my ascent of Takaosan with some co-op friends in Japan. The thick fog is really cool for producing strange, eerie photos.

item.title: Long Way Back
item.description: I’ve made the drive between Calgary and Vancouver quite a few times now. It always sounds pretty daunting before the journey begins because it’s a whole flippin’ 10 hour drive!!! But once we’re actually on the road it’s not too bad. You get to just enter a zen flow state and watch the trees pass by, mountains change their shapes, and the sky get darker and darker… ok maybe that part isn’t as cool.
